remarks: Define the functionalized Hom-set operator, which is exactly like ` Hom ` but is guaranteed to be a function on the base.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-homf $p |- Homf = ( c e. _V |-> ( x e. ( Base ` c ) , y e. ( Base ` c ) |-> ( x ( Hom ` c ) y ) ) ) $.
$d c x y $.
